sentence: Friendly staff but the rooms and infrastructure a bit antiquated especially if you consider the prices
The entire facility was well designed with many nooks and cranies having exhibits tucked in perfectly
Very courteous customer service and nice clean facility
While I have read many positive reviews here regarding the cleanliness of the rooms and facilites the A Team must have been on vacation during my stay
Very nice property fun lobby bar and restaurant
From cleanliness value restaurant lobby bar the Mariot staff and even Jimmy Richardson the hotels preferred limo service are always friendly and reliable
Lobby is nice and bright and clean
Nice lobby concierge hours are limited only drawback
I had lunch and breakfast at downstairs restaurant
Love the lobby bustling
Lots of construciton in the lobby
I appreciate the attempt to remain operable during major renovations but the lobby is a complete eyesore
So I came right back to the lobby and they were quick to put me in a king room

I can understand this being a last minute same day booking kind of room but I was disappointed exhausted arriving at 1 am to have what I would guess to be one of only two rooms in the facility to be of the lowest grade option
We did not use any of the hotel amenities only returned to sleep
For my recent stay the lobby is nice but they have n’t really done much with the rooms
I stayed here a couple of years ago and the rooms were dated then but was told they would be remodeling and they were working on the lobby at that time
On the website these amenities are listed as a room amenity it does not say that they are upon request
I called downstairs and another agent answered and I asked if our original 9th floor room was available and I was told that it was not
did not use many of the facilities but checked in very quickly and never had anything but smiles and positive vibes from staff
Went to get chance from the desk and went back machine spit out the wrong thing‍ ♀ ️ back to front desk and she exchanged it out for me from the “ store ” in the lobby
I could hear everything that went on in the hall all night long and some of what happened in other rooms as well
I was on 9th flor Cold in bar lobby on first night
